Description:
Uses PowerShell to install/copy a file into a system directory such as "System32" or "SysWOW64"

Author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Powershell Install a DLL in System Directory
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext re '(Copy-Item|cpi) .{2,128} -Destination .{1,32}\\Windows\\(System32|SysWOW64)'
